name: Geballer
description:
Geballer is a bullet-hell-dodge-zen-up! It is controlled exclusively through the position of your mouse! No clicking is required to spend countless hours dodging and weaving through the many challenges of Geballer!

Cool things:
  • Dodge 12+ types of bullets
  • Play through the Linear mode
  • Get lost in the Loop mode
  • Discover the REDACTED mode
  • Unlock the Level editor!
  • Make your own Geballer!
  • Use the Level editor to hack the game and get all the achievements faster. Play fair!

We have a long list of features & game modes that did not make it into the initial release! Feel free to drop your suggestions & request into the forums :)
While we can not guarantee that we can afford to realise them all, we are very interested to hear what you think!
